body.p: FBReader is an e-book reader. FBReader supports ePub and fb2 file formats. Please note that DRM-protected books are not supported. If you have any files in supported formats, just put them into Books directory on the memory card. The books will be available in the library. Network library contains a large set of e-books you can download for free or for a fee.
To turn pages swipe screen horizontally or use hardware volume keys.
Preferences Dialog allows you to customize FBReader to suit your taste: colors, fonts, various directories, page turning options, etc.
FBReader's Menu allows you to navigate through libraries and to control the application. If your device has no hardware Menu button, touch bottom-center part of the screen to run menu.
Find more information about FBReader at our site.
Follow us at twitter to learn about new releases and related news.
Make a donation if you would like to support the development of FBReader.
